paper_abstract: In this paper, for a given groupoid (X, (*)) and a relation R on X we consider a related structure LFRX = {< x, y, z > is an element of X-3 vertical bar xRy, yRz}, and we discuss three different types on LFRX, and we construct a linear fuzzy real BCK-algebra (LF <= X, circle minus, epsilon(0)) and a new BCK-algebra (LF <= X, circle star, epsilon(0)) from a BCK-algebra (X, (*), 0).
paper_title: On linear fuzzifications of groupoids with special emphasis on BCK-algebras
